citations.narrative:
Each reporting facility shall submit an annual report to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1 of each
calendar year. The report shall cover the previous Federal fiscal year.
This facility has not yet submitted an Annual Report. The Annual Report was to be submitted by December1,2021. The
Annual Report that includes the number of live animals used for research or teaching must be sent in to the Animal Care
Director .
CORRECT BY : 1/10/2022
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the office manager.
End Section
